content: HL7 Australia announced an Argonaut meeting for Feb 22nd in Melb today. If you haven't received an invitation, and it's interesting for you, let me know and I'll forward you the invitation

Reminder: ARGONAUT AUSTRALIAⓡ Melbourne Event
The Eventbrite link to register is https://argonaut-australia-2018-feb.eventbrite.com.au

ARGONAUT AUSTRALIA®

ARGONAUT AUSTRALIA® brings the Argonaut eco-system to to our shores. HL7 AUSTRALIA® is the first HL7® affiliate to localise the Argonaut specification outside the US-realm.

The Argonaut interface is a FHIR® implementation guide that enables client software (which could be any clinical or patient system) to connect to anoher system ensuring appropriate access and authority.

The Argonaut implemenation guide allows for read-only secure client access to:
problems / medical history
medications
allergies
vital signs measurements
diagnostic results
patient documents
care plans
immunisations

PROGRESS TO DATE

HL7 AUSTRALIA® already has a draft Argonaut interface with Australian adaptations, found here. This is technically and logically aligned with existing HL7 AUSTRALIA® working group activity. It includes balloted HL7 AUSTRALIA® base specifications and related implementation guide profiles, found here.

WHY YOU ARE INVITED AND WHY YOU SHOULD COME

HL7 AUSTRALIA® is the local custodian of the Argonaut specification. ARGONAUT AUSTRALIA® is the first localisation project to be run outside of the US-realm. With already strong adoption in the US, such as inclusion in the Apple Health Kit, Australia is uniquley positioned to shape how the Argonaut specificaton will be expanded for global use.

Argonaut's impact to your work and your organistion is coming, be a part of shaping what that impact is and how it will work for you.

EVENT BREAKDOWN

WELCOME - Jason Steen - Chair, HL7 AUSTRALIA® and Dr Vince McCauley TELSTRA HEALTH®
ARGONAUT AUSTRALIA® ENGAGEMENT EXPLAINED - Jason Steen
INTERNATIONAL ARGONAUT BACKGROUND- Graham Grieve - FHIR® Product Director at HL7® International
WALKTHROUGH OF DRAFT - Brett Esler - Working Group Liaison Officer, HL7 AUSTRALIA®
OPEN FORUM DISCUSSION - lead by Graham Grieve and Brett Esler

SPONSORSHIP: This is a FREE event, thanks to the sponsorship of Telstra Health®.

There are only 60 places available, so register now to aviod disappointment.

If you are unable to make this event, participation through our working groups and future events will alllow you to get involved. Any questions or queries please email us at argonaut@hl7.com.au. We look forward to seeing you there.

Jason Steen
Chair, HL7 AUSTRALIA®
Reminder places are filling fast so get in quick
Am interested but not able to attend in person. Any streaming options?
@Simon McBride will check arrangements and get back to you via the chat

Afraid there is no official streaming available for the event - i'll attempt to set up a webinar on https://zoom.us/j/7479215691 but the quality may not be up to much. Can tune in on the day but no promises.

Refresh of the current build of Argonaut AU http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7au/argonaut-au/ with reference to the CI build of AU base is complete - this will be referenced as part of the Argonaut AU event in Melbourne on friday.
The stream is up on https://zoom.us/j/7479215691 - let me know of any issues; we did out best with audio quality apologies if not good
there is likely a seat limit which i think is 25
zoom has kicked us off - will re-establish shortly
my links - http://www.fhir.org/AU/Argonaut-links (though Brett linked to it from the confluence page link above)
